description.h2: A link:arcroleType element must have a nonempty link:definition.
description.p: The link:arcroleType link:definition text should explain the purpose of the arc role.

The content of link:usedOn is the QName of an arc element; however, note that there are additional rules that restrict what may be used as the value of the xlink:arcrole attribute in instances, schemas and linkbases.
REMARK: The test for emptiness is done after trimming.
REMARK: this applies only to company extension schemas, so if there were any exceptions standard schemas those would not be invalid.

variation.name: 6.7.15 arcrole has no definition element, NOGOOD.
variation.description: arcrole has no definition element, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.7.15 arcrole has a definition element with empty content after trimming, NOGOOD.
variation.description: arcrole has a definition element with empty content after trimming, NOGOOD.
